cvApplication.title: CV Shopper
cvApplication.role: Detect items in a grocery store using computer vision techniques.

picToArt.title: Picture to Art
picToArt.role: Convert any photo into a given style of artwork.

ml.title: ML from Scratch
ml.role: Machine Learning projects without the use of any ML libraries.

nlp.title: NLP Experimentations
nlp.role: Mini-projects including Reddit sentiment classification, Neural Machine Translation, and speech recognition.

cv.title: Computer Vision experimentations
cv.role: Stereo matching and stereo visual odometry.

robo.title: Robotic Pathfinding
robo.role: Mini-projects to try out Robotics techniques including A*, Kalman Filter, Bayesian Localization.
